      • setCout

        public static void setCout(boolean flag)
        Set/Unset standard output as a logging output.
        Default value is true.
        Parameters:
        flag - true if the log should be printed in standard output, false otherwise

      • setCerr

        public static void setCerr(boolean flag)
        Set/Unset standard error output as a logging output.
        Default value is true.
        Parameters:
